name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yuhappy - extract and highlighting words from any webpage
name.zh_CN: 鱼哈皮 - 看网页记单词，免费自动提取任何网页单词并高亮

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yuhappy extract and highlight vocabulary words when you browse any interested webpage.
short.zh_CN: 鱼哈皮 帮助您浏览任何感兴趣的网页时自动提取并高亮生词、划词/划句翻译、听写输入记忆，轻松记单词.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yuhappy can extract any webpage to highlight the words you care about, and synchronize and save the highlighted words to the vocabulary book with one click. It covers the complete vocabulary book system of Grade 4 and 6, Exam, IELTS, TOEFL, etc., and provides word dictation, intelligent hints for errors and loops to assist in memorizing efficiently, and uses anti-forgotten algorithms and fragmented time reminders to consolidate memories through review.

★ Work and study at the same time, automatic matching of raw words, highlighting tips and translations
According to the vocabulary book you choose and different difficulty levels, it automatically matches the word highlighting and translation. When browsing the web, you only need to focus on your rusty vocabulary, and strengthen your memory in different reading scenarios.

★ Read based on interest, keep accumulating and mastering personal vocabulary
Read foreign language content of interest, constantly build and train your own vocabulary book, the words that have been focused on will be repeatedly highlighted in the later reading web pages, constantly strengthening the word memory, unknowingly expanding vocabulary.

★ Reading memory is not deep, word dictation to assist efficient memory
The vocabulary book words, phrases, example sentences dictation integrated input memory, the wrong word intelligent cycle to strengthen the memory algorithm, each word is equipped with a picture of the meaning of the representative and accurate audio, keyboard input spelling to strengthen the formation of muscle memory
long.zh_CN:
兴趣阅读，告别枯燥，免费从自己最感兴趣的阅读中沉浸式高效记单词

鱼哈皮 能自动匹配任何英文网站将您关注的单词并高亮，并将高亮生词一键同步保存到生词本， 涵盖四六级、考研、雅思、托福等完整的单词书系统，并提供单词听写、错误智能提示与循环辅助高效记忆，使用抗遗忘算法和碎片时间提醒复习巩固记忆。

★ 工作学习两不误，生词自动匹配，高亮提示和翻译
根据您选择的单词书及不同难度等级，自动匹配单词高亮并进行翻译。在浏览网页时您只需专注自己生疏的词汇，在不同的阅读场景语境中加强记忆

★ 基于兴趣阅读告别枯燥，智能生词本，不断积累掌握个人生词
看感兴趣的外文内容，不断的构建和训练自己的生词本，被加关注的单词会在后面的阅读中网页反复高亮提示，不断强化单词记忆，不知不觉中扩增词汇量

★ 阅读记忆不深，单词听写辅助高效记忆
生词本单词、短语、例句听写一体输入记忆, 错误单词智能循环强化记忆算法, 每个单词都配有代表意思的图片和精准的音频，键盘输入拼写强化形成肌肉记忆
